price: Akasema: Hakika wewe hutaweza kuvumilia kuwa pamoja nami.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
